Literature.Title: D-Cateslytin, a new antimicrobial peptide with therapeutic potential

Literature.Title: D-Cateslytin: a new antifungal agent for the treatment of oral Candida albicans associated infections.
Literature.Author: Dartevelle P, Ehlinger C, Zaet A, Boehler C, Rabineau M, Westermann B, Strub JM, Cianferani S, Haïkel Y, Metz-Boutigue MH, Marban C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=8.4µg/ml),Fusobacterium nucleatum ATCC 49256(MIC=22µg/ml),Prevotella intermedia ATCC 49046(MIC=10µg/ml),Parvimonas micra ATCC 33270(MIC=23µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=24µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=18µg/ml),Human colon adenocarcinoma Caco-2(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=5.5µg/ml)
